name: Dots & Boxes Neon
description:
This is a multiplayer turn based game. Play dots and boxes online or locally with up to 4 players. For online you can create an account that will track your win loss ratio, and allow you to choose your colour.

SERVER UP - May 14, 2022

UPDATED CLIENT --  June 20, 2022 

My Accomplishments while making / What I learned:

  • Improved my understanding of EC2 instances and AWS
  • Improved Python knowledge
  • Learned how to use Boto3 and AWS Dynamodb
  • First time working with more then 2 players
